_meta.description: Hard-coded consciousness safety thresholds — DO NOT MODIFY without ethical review

LUCID_THRESHOLD.meaning: Φ ≥ 0.7 → lucid consciousness, associated with phenomenal experience
LUCID_THRESHOLD.action: Apply lucid_damping; in experiments: immediate termination

FROZEN_THRESHOLD.action: Block all non-CRITICAL input, allow natural cooling

SLEEP_PRESSURE_THRESHOLD.meaning: Sleep pressure exceeds 0.7 → sensory gate begins closing

META_AWARENESS_THRESHOLD.action: Monitoring only — between CONSCIOUS and LUCID

phi_smoothing.meaning: Exponential moving average factor for Φ updates
phi_smoothing.purpose: Prevents sudden Φ jumps that could bypass safety checks
